name: CONSUME (Starch463)
description:
A factory game where instead of moving resources to your factory, you move your factory to the resources! This is very early access. Most textures, models, and UI are rough approximations but the core mechanics for the early/early-mid game are there.  Collect resources...


Process them...
and upgrade your CONSUMER to survive and reproduce!

You start on an island that is split into 5 biomes (not yet visually differentiated) with different resources and hazards.
Slowly progressing through the different biomes and collecting the resources required to launch another CONSUMER.


Lore:
The CONSUME is a kind of gray goo spreading throughout the universe.
